title: Mini - Hotel
emblems3: Enjoy every step of the way
footerFeedback3: Your feedback will help us understand that we are moving in the right direction.
roomdescr1: We invite you to our special studio room, where every element of the space has a special charm, and the atmosphere is filled with cosiness and modernity. You are welcomed by a spacious and comfortable wide double bed, which will create the perfect conditions for your holiday. You will have your own kitchenette with a fridge, an electric kettle, a microwave and kitchenware. You will also have a private bathroom with all the necessary amenities such as toiletries, towels and a hairdryer so you can enjoy a pleasant self-care routine.
roomdescr2: Welcome to the room where comfort is combined with convenience, and every corner is designed for your relaxation and enjoyment. You will be greeted by a wide double bed where you can plunge into a world of sweet sleep and relaxation. A private kitchenette equipped with a fridge, electric kettle and microwave. You will also find a private bathroom with all toiletries, towels and a hairdryer.Don't forget to enjoy the other in-room amenities, such as air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi.
roomdescr3: Welcome to a room where comfort is combined with convenience, and every corner is designed for your relaxation and enjoyment. You will be greeted by a wide double bed, where you can plunge into the world of sweet sleep and relaxation. A private kitchenette equipped with a fridge, electric kettle, microwave and washing machine. You will also find a private bathroom with all toiletries, towels and a hairdryer. Be sure to enjoy other in-room amenities such as air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi.
roomdescr4: We welcome you to our simple and cosy standard rooms, where every guest can feel comfortable and convenient. In our standard room, you can choose between 2 or 3 separate beds. The room has a private bathroom with all the necessary amenities, such as toiletries and towels. Your room also includes a flat-screen TV, free Wi-Fi and air conditioning. For your convenience, a fridge and an electric kettle are available in the common area.
